title: Product Dimensions
descriptions: The Beginning of the Execution Phase
paragraphs: In Product Dimesion we had lessons about product iterations, after which we had one week to create a scale, carton replica of a chosen controller.
My Project Partner Nicklas and I construced a Dreamcast controller
The main learnings of the course were using pretotypes and prototypes for a better result, as well as how to manage expectations and the time available to meet them.
